title: The Fuzztones - Lysergic Emanations@320
description:
Released in Europe a year earlier, The Fuzztones&#039; first studio LP, Lysergic Emanations, is a focused spasm of energy and abandon. Rudi Protrudi growls through some of the most furious Fuzztones songs ever recorded, as Deb O&#039;Nair pounds her Vox organ.(AMG)


This is the classic Fuzztones album from the early incarnation of the band. Featuring unbeatable original songs and covers that are better than the original recordings. The energy and production are so strong - I daresay, relentless - this album will knock your socks (and maybe a few other things) right off! (Amazon)


01. 1-2-5                                                          
02. Gotta Get Some                                               
03. Journey To Tyme                                              
04. Ward 81                                                      
05. Strychnine                                                   
06. Radar Eyes                                                   
07. Cinderella                                                   
08. Highway 69                                                   
09. Just Once                                                    
10. She&#039;s Wicked                                                 
11. As Time&#039;s Gone                                               
12. Living Sickness                                              
13. Bad News Travels Fast (Peel Sessions)                        
14. She&#039;s Wicked (Peel Sessions)                                 
15. Epitaph For A Head (Peel Sessions)                           
16. Cinderella (Peel Sessions)                                   
17. Green Slime


Tracks 13-16 taken from The Peel Sessions. 
Track 17 taken from Lysergic Sessions.

Original Release Date: 1984
Label: Music Maniac
Released: 1992
